name: Federación Digital EA
membership: FEDI-EA is member of EURAO (European Radio Amateurs' Organization, http://www.eurao.org).
goal: Promotion of Amateur Radio activities, services and representation before Public Administrations.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Be aware of electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) aproved by UE. Youth, women and transnational human networks.
